snippet.title: Sega Strike Fighter Arcade (USA)
snippet.description:
The player takes on the role of a Marine aviator codename Blue 2 in F/A Hornet. The game has three game mode Easy, Intermidiate and Hard. So, you'll start in missions starting from basic training to the ground to ground fighting with a full attack from SU7s as well as ground to air missions with anti-aircraft guns.  
Operation Red Fire and Operation Red Rock, both wars between fictional countries that you need to stop by elimination crucial targets and force the enemy to retreat.

The game is played with Rudder Pedals, throttle, flight stick with trigger guns, and thumb button missile to realistically simulate flying with the U.S. built fighter bomber F/A Hornet.

Unlike After Burner this game is more grounded to reality and less overexaggerated.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
